instruction: Decompose time-series data into trend, seasonal, and residual components using various decomposition methods. Implement classical decomposition, STL (Seasonal and Trend decomposition using Loess), X-11, and other advanced decomposition techniques for time-series analysis.
description: Implement time-series decomposition methods to separate trend, seasonal, and residual components. Use classical and modern decomposition techniques.
keywords: decomposition, STL, seasonal, trend, time-series, python, statsmodels, pandas, classical decomposition, X-11
